project.name: ${project.artifactId}
project.description: This is the POM module that doesn't contain any code - it's just a module that joins two logical modules: web-view that contains web specific stuff like web.xml, web resources; and web-controller that contains logic for event handling from web pages. This separating chaises such aims: a) separating different logic that shouldn't be together b) giving an opportunity to include event handling logic to other modules (e.g. for testing purposes)
